original_text: Also, you must not accept money from a killer who has run to a safe city. You must not let him return to his own home until the leader of the priests has died.
korean_text: 또 도피성에 피한 자는 대제사장이 죽기 전에는 속전을 받고 그의 땅으로 돌아가 거주하게 하지 말 것이니라

sentences.original_text: Also, you must not accept money
sentences.korean_translation: 또한, 당신은 돈을 받아서는 안 됩니다

sentences.original_text: from a killer who has run to a safe city
You must not let him return to his own home
sentences.korean_translation: 당신은 그가 자기 집으로 돌아가게 해서는 안 됩니다

sentences.original_text: until the leader of the priests has died
